check_http_code.title: Default Check HTTP Code.
check_http_code.description: HTTP code to check against (default: comes from master partition).

check_certificate_expiration_days.title: Check Certificate Expiration
check_certificate_expiration_days.description: Amount of days to consider certificate as expired (default: comes from master partition).

check_frontend_ip.title: Space separated list of Frontend IPs to check
check_frontend_ip.description: List of Frontend IPs to check, if empty no constraint is used (default: comes from master partition).
